      • generateClientId

        public static String generateClientId()
        Returns a randomly generated client identifier based on the the fixed prefix (tijos) and the system time.

        When cleanSession is set to false, an application must ensure it uses the same client identifier when it reconnects to the server to resume state and maintain assured message delivery.

        Returns:
        a generated client identifier
        See Also:
        MqttConnectOptions.setCleanSession(boolean)

                             int waitNum)

      • publish

        public int publish(String topic,
                   byte[] payload,
                   int qos,
                   boolean retained)
            throws MqttException
        publish topic to the server
        Parameters:
        topic - the topic name
        payload - the payload data
        qos - the qos
        retained - if retained in server
        Returns:
        the message id for the current publish, it is used in the publishCompleted event
        Throws:
        MqttException - If a MQTT error occurs

        public int subscribe(String topic,
                     int qos)
              throws MqttException
        subscribe a topic from the server
        Parameters:
        topic - the topic name to subscribe
        qos - the qos to subscribe
        Returns:
        the message id for the current subscribe, it is used in the subscribeCompleted event
        Throws:
        MqttException - If a MQTT error occurs

      • unsubscribe

        public int unsubscribe(String topic)
                throws MqttException
        unsubscribe a topic from the server
        Parameters:
        topic - the topic name to subscribe
        Returns:
        the message id for the current subscribe, it is used in the unsubscribeCompleted event

        MqttException - If a MQTT error occurs
